br.p: Welcome to the fundamentals! Every step will have a backwars and a forwards button, so you can jump between if you need. To start, press start bellow, and we'll roll the first part of the fundamentals; the alphabet! Have fun! And oh, we also have a Helpanto button, that will hep you extra... if you need som extra tip (try pressing the one bellow!)

div.p: Hola! Me nomesas Helpanto e me esas tua helpanto!
Hello! My name is Helpanto (helper), and I am your helpanto! Any time you get stuck on a level, or perhaps need extra assistant, you can always ask me! I'll always be hiding in the orange button!
